title: About MineCrift
author: henryminecraft
txt_content:
本帖最后由 henryminecraft 于 2013-5-25 21:22 编辑 

Features
Randomly generated, the space is almost infinite world；
Eight times larger than the earth's surface；
Able to build anything, as long as you can imagine；
A total of more than one hundred kinds of different types of squares;
 Together with friends in the network can build a new world;
 Single survival mode, build your own world;
 Server mode, play with players all over the world；
(the above is only for early versions, newer versions content than the rich）






Minecraft was initially completed by a person independent of the game, the game designer Markus Alexej Persson (Markus alexei poisson), commonly referred to as Notch, get inspiration from many game, is among the more famous dungeon guardian, and want to process Infiniminer also had considerable influence on him but for all the game only one person, but once set a daily profit of 260000 euros (equivalent to about 2.42 million yuan) record of Minecraft belong to 3 d sand table games, in the first person in the world is not beautiful graphics and special effects, but pay attention to the players in the game are doing construction on gameplay, destruction and so on many things, like lego blocks through combination and put together, easy to produce small wooden castle even city, but if combined with the player's imagination, the air of city underground city are all the same players can be implemented not only can create housing construction, urban and can even create your own world, players can through their own creation。






Minecraft is divided into free version (Classic) and paid two versions (Alpha and Beta), although can create unlimited free version, but now only paid version is work in progress in the world of the free version is not the enemy invasion, no Boss can beat, more do not need to worry about any natural disasters such as volcanic eruption or landslide, players can be unlimited use any square to construct their own world as for paying mode in survival mode and enrich many limit mode, while in the game to use don't like the free version that unlimited use of resources, but through different ways are needed to obtain (mining plant attack animals and monsters, etc.), square carrying quantity also have limit players must use the cube to build architecture to build equipment to withstand monster attacks, protect themselves, to survive and even some squares can be made into a boat box mining truck or rail, etc. Various kinds of props。

But due to the server's burden co., LTD., registered in August 2010 also stop the game (now open registration) official version is Minecraft paid version Alpha and Beta version, as of February 28, 2013, the latest stable version as official version 1.5.1。


Lovers produced all kinds of game mod is also a highlight of the game, such as the industrial age, the construction period, senior redstone animal magic missiles, etc are very popular。、




In addition, this game is a lot of netizens praised as one of the world's most fun game, in China, has completely beyond the cf csol, and many other similar boring game version of the game is divided into four different development version: the Classic version, the most basic version; Indev version, which adds many new features; Infdev version, this version of the game map is almost no boundary; Beta version, this is on a new version of the game though Indev version and Infdev version can also be used, but no longer provide support or updates the Beta would become the main version of the game, the free version at the same time changed its name to the Classic version limit model is enhanced survival mode, survival mode than more challenging game。

Classic version of the Classic version of the free to focus on the basic function of the game, it is divided into Survival mode (Survival) and create (Creative), whether it is a single mode or in multiplayer servers, players can build and dismantle anything, without having to worry about attacks or lava and landslides hHealth value is the player's health, and hunger values will affect the players running or to restore health, hunger has a value greater than 8 will restore health value, the value is reduced to no hunger, will deduct half seconds per value to one's health while restrictions in the vertical direction with height and depth, but the Beta support borderless horizontal range map with the game player generated by the program, to explore the game world completely before reaching the technical limit size can be extended to the nearly 8 times the size of earth surface area single or multiplayer Beta [3] may be in a separate client or browser Minecraft Alpha on December 20, 2009 from the private Beta version to Beta, does the name changeazards, but there is a pity is that it has no more diamonds and all kinds of monsters, including the hell gate, and map also have restriction in the free version, the player has unlimited squares were used to build things, and no matter what kind of diamonds can be placed or removed immediately the free version is no longer updated, is expected to be phasing out, along with the development of the paid version and the paid version will be the only version of Minecraft's official website has released a free Minecraft English version of the official server software, but some fans have already built a custom server with additional functionality。




Beta is Minecraft is no longer updated version, and only purchase game players can play get Beta version there are two kinds of mode, survival mode and create patterns (Beta version 1.8 haven't create mode) survival mode players through the excavation of underground useful ore, construction of building and make all kinds of instruments to protect themselves, from in the evening or in the caves of monster attacks create mode is the system will automatically provide you with any material, and not die injured, also can fly in the game contains different terrain and climate (Biome), terrain, such as cliff plains beach, etc.; Climate is divided into different communities such as snow forest swamp desert, every kind of climate a have their own characteristics in the game for twenty minutes a day, and every ten minutes, day and night sky is fully dynamic, can see the rise and fall of the sun and moon, clouds move, and illumination in different time will also be different Beta also through the inventory system to limit the number of players to carry bricks, and must pass through all the bricks。Health value is the player's health, and hunger values will affect the players running or to restore health, hunger has a value greater than 8 will restore health value, the value is reduced to no hunger, will deduct half seconds per value to one's health while restrictions in the vertical direction with height and depth, but the Beta support borderless horizontal range map with the game player generated by the program, to explore the game world completely before reaching the technical limit size can be extended to the nearly 8 times the size of earth surface area single or multiplayer Beta [3] may be in a separate client or browser Minecraft Alpha on December 20, 2009 from the private Beta version to Beta, does the name change。

特征随机生成的空间，几乎是无限的世界；八倍于地球表面；能够建立任何东西，只要你能想象；共有超过一百种不同类型的广场；在网络的朋友可以建立一个新的世界；单一的生存模式，建立自己的世界；服务器模式，发挥与世界各地的玩家；（以上仅是早期版本，新版本的含量较丰富，）Minecraft最初是由一个独立的人完成游戏，游戏设计师Markus Alexej佩尔松（Markus阿列克谢泊松），通常被称为缺口，从许多游戏的灵感，更是著名的地牢守护者之间，和要处理的infiniminer也对他有相当大的影响，但所有的游戏只有一个人，但一旦设定每日利润260000欧元（折合人民币约2420000元）记录Minecraft属于3 D沙盘游戏，在第一世界的人是不是美丽的图形和特殊效果，但要注意游戏中的玩家对游戏做建筑，破坏等很多东西，如乐高积木通过组合起来，容易产生小木屋城堡甚至城市，但是如果结合玩家的想象力，城市地下城市的空气都是一样的球员可以实现不仅可以创造住房建设，城市，甚至可以创建你自己的世界，玩家可以通过自己的创作的。Minecraft分为免费版（经典）和支付两个版本（α和β），虽然可以创造出无限的免费版本，但现在只有付费版在免费版世界进步的工作不是敌人的入侵，没有老板会心跳，更不需要担心任何这样的自然灾害当火山爆发或滑坡，玩家可以无限制的使用任何广场建设自己的世界里为生存模式付费模式和丰富许多限制模式，而在游戏中使用不喜欢免费版，无限的资源的使用，但通过不同的方式来获得（挖掘植物攻击动物与怪物，等），方载量也有限制，玩家必须使用多维数据集建立体系结构建立设备抵御怪物的攻击，保护自己，生存甚至一些方块可以做成船箱矿用卡车或铁路，等各种道具Minecraft分为免费版（经典）和支付两个版本（α和β），虽然可以创造出无限的免费版本，但现在只有付费版在免费版世界进步的工作不是敌人的入侵，没有老板会心跳，更不需要担心任何这样的自然灾害当火山爆发或滑坡，玩家可以无限制的使用任何广场建设自己的世界里为生存模式付费模式和丰富许多限制模式，而在游戏中使用不喜欢免费版，无限的资源的使用，但通过不同的方式来获得（挖掘植物攻击动物与怪物，等），方载量也有限制，玩家必须使用多维数据集建立体系结构建立设备抵御怪物的攻击，保护自己，生存甚至一些方块可以做成船箱矿用卡车或铁路，等各种道具但由于服务器的负担，有限，有限公司，注册于2010八月也停止了游戏（现在开放注册）官方版本的付费版本的α和β版Minecraft，截至2013年2月28日，最新的稳定版本为正式版本1.5.1情人生产各种游戏模式也是游戏的一个亮点，如工业时代，施工期间，高级红石动物的魔法飞弹，等等都是非常流行的。、此外，这个游戏是很多网友誉为是世界上最有趣的游戏，在中国，已经完全超出了CF和CSOL，许多其他类似的无聊的游戏版本的游戏分为四个不同的开发版本：经典版本，最基本的版本；indev版本，这增加了许多新的特点；infdev版本，这个版本的游戏地图几乎没有边界；测试版，这是一个新版本的游戏indev版和infdev版本也可以使用，但不再提供支持或更新测试版将成为游戏的主要版本，同时免费版更名为经典的版本限制模型增强的生存模式，生存模式更具有挑战性的游戏。关于游戏的版本号问题：许多新的人容易混淆，认为1.81版本高于1实际上是正确的版本为：beta1.3 -> beta1.4 -> Beta1.5 -> beta1.6 -> -> -> beta1.9pre-release beta1.8 beta1.7然后：正式版的1 - > 1.1 - >正式版1.2.3 ->的正式版
